ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Psycasts Expanded Add-on - Warframe
ModMetaData.author: Milkwater
ModMetaData.description:
Adds 4 brand new Vanilla Psycasts Expanded psycast trees to Rimworld, based on different warframes from the game, Warframe. Each tree has 4 different psycasts.
 Currently features:
 - Ember tree
 - Fireball
 - Immolation
 - Fire Blast
 - Inferno
 - Excalibur tree
 - Slash dash
 - Radial blind
 - Radial javelin
 - Exalted blade
 - Loki tree
 - Decoy
 - Invisibility
 - Switch teleport
 - Radial disarm
 - Rhino tree
 - Rhino charge
 - Iron skin
 - Roar
 - Rhino stomp
